title: Teemo's Music and General Feedback
body:
Dear Audio Team,

I like the music for the login screen. It's awesome, and it's also awesome that login music is a regular feature with new champs and new events. I remember only a few years ago when you wow'd us with the first New Champ Login Music and you've been doing it continuously ever since. 

Thanks for doing a great job with lol Audio. I've been around since before Season 1 and you guys have always been pretty fantastic at your jobs. I appreciate the team of Audio Designers and Engineers working at Riot and I think they should pay you all more.

Cheers!

PS: Not to mention the amazing job you guys do with cinimatic trailers and music videos.
